articles.title: America's Got Talent fans left in TEARS over performance of Putri Ariani - Daily Mail
articles.description: Putri Ariani, who hails from Indonesia, gave a show-stopping performance that triggered waterworks for judges and viewers alike. Even usually stoic Simon Cowell was moved by her act.
